revised_title: Seismic and Gravity Data Analysis of the Afar Triangle and Surrounding Areas
tldr: The author analyzes seismic and gravity data from the Afar triangle and surrounding areas, focusing on the Red Sea, Gulf of Aden, and Ethiopia rift junction. They discuss the distribution of seismic activity along the western escarpment and the Wonji Fault Belt, as well as the relationship between seismic events and tectonic structures in the region. The study provides insights into the structure and evolution of the Afar triangle and its connection to the surrounding areas.
